WorkItem.Description:
I downloaded the latest version of rawr this morning (2.2.16). Other characters load fine, but I am having trouble with warrior characters. When I try to load them from the armory, the armory information seems to download ok, but then when rawr tries to open the character an error message comes up saying 'rawr has stopped working' and rawr then closes itself.
 
I have tried this with 2 warriors from my guild, and the results were the same with both.
 
Character details are:-
 
Name: Tonka Realm: Nagrand EU
 
Name: Dum Realm: As above.
 
I'd be grateful if you could look at this for me, thanks.
WorkItem.Summary: [ProtWarr] Failure to load character from armory

Comments.Message: I can't load the character at all right now, the EU armory may be down or I just can't access it from work. I'll look more into this tonight.
I have had the same experience. Seem to only happen with protection warriors. I do notice Rawr fill in the race and spec before it crashes. Fury warriors load fine.

Same this is happening with my Protection warrior

Name: Ozymandius  Realm: Aegwynn

The problem is systemic to Protection Warriors only and I found the reason:

Opening a new character in ProtWarr (via Armory/Char Profiler) will cause a Set Default Buffs to run, which is adding the Grace Buff. We just changed that Buff's name because it was no longer valid. The replacement is called Renewed Hope. I fixed that line in my build and it worked fine after that.
ProtWarr dev will need to fix this and make a commit
I have the same problem with my ProtWarri Name: Zoli Realm: Dalvengyr EU

Funky bug! This is fixed with commit 36705 as far as I can tell. Thanks for the reports checking it out Jothay.



** Closed by EvanM 9/15/2009 12:35 PM
I'm getting this error on Blackhand server trying to load my DK, so more then warriors are effected.
